revised_title: Electrical Properties of Dielectrics and the Flow of Electricity
tldr: The author studied the flow of electricity through dielectrics and found that the charging current diminishes as the time of charging increases. They also discovered that the true electrical resistance of the specimens can be determined by calculating the rate at which the charge accumulates. Additionally, the author investigated the force acting on a cylinder moving in an ideal fluid and the effect of circulation on the motion.
